columns.name: source_account_id
columns.description: The AWS Account ID in which the resource is located.

columns.name: resource_id
columns.description: The ID of the covered resource.

columns.name: resource_type
columns.description: The type of the covered resource.

columns.name: scan_type
columns.description: The Amazon Inspector scan type covering the resource.

columns.name: ec2_ami_id
columns.description: The ID of the Amazon Machine Image (AMI) used to launch the instance.

columns.name: ecr_image_tag
columns.description: Tags associated with the Amazon ECR image metadata.

columns.name: ecr_repository_name
columns.description: The name of the Amazon ECR repository.

columns.name: ecr_repository_scan_frequency
columns.description: The frequency of scans for an object that contains details about the repository an Amazon ECR image resides in.

columns.name: scan_status_code
columns.description: The status code of the scan.

columns.name: ec2_instance_tags
columns.description: The tags attached to the instance.

columns.name: ecr_image_tags
columns.description: Tags associated with the Amazon ECR image metadata.

columns.name: lambda_function_tags
columns.description: The resource tags on an AWS Lambda function.

columns.name: lambda_function_layers
columns.description: The layers for an AWS Lambda function. A Lambda function can have up to five layers.
